exposurecontrol: Programmed auto with exposure compensation (±2 EV in steps of 1/3 EV)
meteringmode: 256-segment matrix, center-weighted (at under 2x digital zoom), spot (at 2x digital zoom and up)
chargingtime: Approx. 2h 50min (using Charging AC Adapter EH-69P; battery fully discharged)
suppliedaccessories: Camera Strap, Charging AC Adapter EH-69P, USB Cable UC-E16
focallength: 4.1-12.3 mm (angle of view equivalent to 29-87 mm lens in 35 mm [135] format)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 77.0 x 51.2 x 17.2 mm (3.1 x 2.1 x 0.7 in.), excluding projections
fileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Movies: MOV (H.264/MPEG-4 AVC with LPCM monaural sound)
monitor: 6.2 cm (2.5-in.), approx. 230k-dot touch screen TFT LCD
focusareaselection: Face priority, center, manual (tap to select)
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (European and Brazilian), Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Tamil, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
imagesensor: 1/2.9-in. type CCD; total pixels: approx. 10.34 million
digitalzoommagnification: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to approx. 348 mm lens in 35 mm [135] format)
